CustomField.formula: IF( AND(BillingCountry = "United States",NOT(SLED_Account__c)), IF( OR( Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 175, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c >= 351, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c >= 1000),"ENT - COR", IF( OR( Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 31, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c >= 51, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c >= 150),"MM", IF( OR( Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 11, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c >= 31, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c >= 31),"CML", IF( OR( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 0, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 10, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 0, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c <= 30, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 0, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c <= 30),"SMB",NULL)))), IF( AND( BillingCountry = "United States",SLED_Account__c), IF( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Federal"),"ENT - COR", IF(OR( Number_of_Students__c >= 13000, Number_of_Citizens__c >= 100000),"ENT - COR", IF(OR( AND( Number_of_Students__c > 0, Number_of_Students__c < 13000), AND( Number_of_Citizens__c > 0, Number_of_Citizens__c < 100000)),"MM",NULL))), IF( BillingCountry = "Canada", IF( OR(AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 10, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 30), AND( Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 30, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c <= 50), AND( Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 30, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c <= 50)),"CML", IF(OR(AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 30, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 449), AND( Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 50, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c <= 899), AND( Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 150, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c <= 2499)),"MM", IF(OR( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 449, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 899, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 2499),"ENT - COR", IF(OR( AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 0, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 10), AND( Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 0, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c <= 30), AND( Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 0, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c <= 30)),"SMB",NULL)))), IF( BillingCountry = "Mexico", IF(OR( AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 20, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 299), AND( Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 40, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c <= 599), AND( Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 120, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c <= 1799)),"MM", IF(OR( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 299, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 599, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 1799),"ENT - SEL", IF(OR( AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 0, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 19), AND( Number_of_Powered_Assets__c > 0, Number_of_Powered_Assets__c <= 39), AND( Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c > 0, Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c <= 119)),"SMB",NULL))), IF(OR( BillingCountry = "France",BillingCountry = "Germany",BillingCountry = "Belgium",BillingCountry = "United Kingdom" ,BillingCountry = "Luxembourg",BillingCountry = "Spain",BillingCountry = "Hungary",BillingCountry = "Italy" ,BillingCountry = "Austria",BillingCountry = "Netherlands",BillingCountry = "Ireland",BillingCountry = "Switzerland" ,BillingCountry = "Bulgaria",BillingCountry = "Czech Republic",BillingCountry = "Poland" ,BillingCountry = "Portugal",BillingCountry = "Isle of Man"), IF( AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 0, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 20),"SMB", IF( AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 21, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 175),"MM", IF( AND( Number_of_Vehicles__c >= 176, Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 550),"ENT - COR", IF( Number_of_Vehicles__c > 550,"ENT - SEL",NULL)))),NULL)))))
CustomField.label: Updated Account Size Segment
